message: I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. It's a unique item that I think you'll really appreciate. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,200,000.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I'm looking to pay closer to my budget. Would you be willing to consider $1,050,000? It's a fair price that's still beneficial for both of us.

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I get a good deal. I'm counteroffering at $1,150,000. This is my final offer for now, but I'm open to negotiations if you're willing to meet me in the middle.
